original_title: Aldo Rossi: Il Teatro del Mondo
overview: The Teatro del Mondo is one the most famous works by the italian architect Aldo Rossi. This surprising floating theatre sailed, in 1979, from Venice to Dubrovnik becoming a legendary event in history of architecture. The man and the architect trough the words of some of his best friends and fans.
title: Aldo Rossi: Il Teatro del Mondo
